TopicTitle: "Plan Kappa" - A KSP graphic novel (Jeb is back in Chapter 53! Well, kinda.)

Articles.Content:
Hey, folks! Sorry for the lack of updates. This has been a busy month, and I didn't have time to play the game much. Nothing interesting happened since the last interlude, but I may do another Time-Warp magazine interview whenever I find the time. I barely even toyed with 1.05 yet...

So... have a little patience. Things will get better in the next few weeks.

So... have a little patience. Things will get better in the next few weeks.

Perfect--you'll be back on right when E:O0 finishes!

Hey, folks! Sorry for the lack of updates. This has been a busy month, and I didn't have time to play the game much. Nothing interesting happened since the last interlude, but I may do another Time-Warp magazine interview whenever I find the time. I barely even toyed with 1.05 yet...

So... have a little patience. Things will get better in the next few weeks.

You're just giving me more time to work the bugs out of Pathfinder, and finally work on some improvements for the parts.

You're just giving me more time to work the bugs out of Pathfinder, and finally work on some improvements for the parts.

Yeah, don't worry too much about me. I have a backup copy of KSP still in 1.04, and will keep Plan Kappa on it until all the mods I'm using are updated to work with 1.05.

Now, about that interlude... Never say I never give you folks anything:
Space jacuzzis. Well done.
The Jacuzzi of Doom LOL
"The jacuzzi of doom" *Laughing too hard to coherently type*
Science is about the juithhh!
Well done! The space jacuzzi! Loved the Hitchhiker reference too!

Wonderful interlude, Parkaboy!

Brilliant work. Thanks.

Happy landings!

T-W:Right now, I don't think I can handle the truth.

Is that a reference to E:O0?

Edited November 12, 2015 by Monkey29399

Is that a reference to E:O0?

Yes, although it is also a reference to a movie called A Few Good Men.
Linus...*facepalm* Gene should send Wernher - nobody would be able to understand him through his thick accent anyway Still Jacuzzi of DOOM! Brilliant
Yay, updates.

Gene should send Wernher - nobody would be able to understand him through his thick accent anyway

That's a printed media! Can you imagine what kind of translation they would come up with?!

That's a printed media! Can you imagine what kind of translation they would come up with?!

They may think he's talking about "pretzels" instead of "vessels".
Now I wonder how exactly Linus's great-grandfather got rich. Inventing and producing SRB fuel?
Inventing space-proof snacks?

That Jacuzzi whirlpool waS one of the best explanation about the dynamics involving gravity and time dilatation I ever read!

Edited November 16, 2015 by Nahim
Its been a week since anything has happened here... :(

[quote name='TheGamingNoobster']Its been a week since anything has happened here... :([/QUOTE]

Sorry about that. I'm trying to put out another interlude this week, but things have been frantic in RL. I'm a teacher, and we're approaching the end of the school year in Brazil, so there's a lot of papers to grade. Good news is that the summer break is coming, and I'll have lots of time.
Ah, it's all good. It is end of the school year in Australia (1 week left!) I can only imagine all of the work that my teachers have to mark...

Anyway, here's another interlude. At this rate, I'm probably going to do more of these than of actual chapters...

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/A9RVkBl.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pqxgMCt.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/QHzGQCo.jpg[/IMG]

Thanks Parakaboy!

That was wonderful. I do so enjoy these.

Happy landings!
Bob the BadS? Actually has a nice ring to it...
